name: Hemingway Quotes
description: It was a pleasant cafe, warm and clean and friendly, (...) and ordered a cafe au lait. The waiter brought it and I took out a notebook from the pocket of the coat and a pencil and started to write.

name: Crane Migration
description: Every March, roughly one million sandhill cranes migrate on the Platte River Valley and land in Nebraska before resuming a northward migration. What a cool adventure!

name: Support local
description: Supporting local business can help to strengthen the local economy, reduce environmental impact, and create jobs in our communities
